channel.title: Error running Runescape on IE and Firefox
channel.description:
Everytime when I run Runescape on IE it closed my IE and it show a text file called," hs_err_pid2088" on my desk for some reason.When I run Runescape on firefox, it closed my firefox when it load but there is no text file on my desktop from it.How can I fix the error? Here is the information when I open the hs_err_pid2088:
# # An unexpected error has been detected by HotSpot Virtual Machine: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x05147d77, pid=2088, tid=504 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.5.0_10-b03 mixed mode, sharing) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x87d77] # --------------- T H R E A D --------------- Current thread (0x028f0760): JavaThread "main" [_thread_in_vm, id=504] EIP=0x05147d77, EFLAGS=0x00010246 Top of Stack: (sp=0x00133154) 0x00133154: 0514a655 00000000 00000000 028f0820 0x00133164: 6d31775b 0000000c 20b5f090 00000000 0x00133174: 00133174 00000000 0292af64 item.title: Error running Runescape on IE and Firefox
item.dc:creator: @efrem efrem
item.description:
@efrem wrote:

Thank You. Finally I fixed it. I didn’t even bother about it until I make this topic.

Read full topic

Everytime when I run Runescape on IE it closed my IE and it show a text file called," hs_err_pid2088" on my desk for some reason.When I run Runescape on firefox, it closed my firefox when it load but there is no text file on my desktop from it.How can I fix the error?
